parameter.description: Covariance between zonal and meridional components of the wind. Defined as [uv]-[u][v], where "[]" indicates the mean over the indicated time span.
Covariance between zonal component of the wind and temperature. Defined as [uT]-[u][T], where "[]" indicates the mean over the indicated time span.
Covariance between meridional component of the wind and temperature. Defined as [vT]-[v][T], where "[]" indicates the mean over the indicated time span.
Covariance between temperature and vertical component of the wind. Defined as [wT]-[w][T], where "[]" indicates the mean over the indicated time span.
Covariance between zonal and zonal components of the wind. Defined as [uu]-[u][u], where "[]" indicates the mean over the indicated time span.
Covariance between meridional and meridional components of the wind. Defined as [vv]-[v][v], where "[]" indicates the mean over the indicated time span.
Covariance between specific humidity and zonal components of the wind. Defined as [uq]-[u][q], where "[]" indicates the mean over the indicated time span.
Covariance between specific humidity and meridional components of the wind. Defined as [vq]-[v][q], where "[]" indicates the mean over the indicated time span.
Covariance between temperature and vertical components of the wind. Defined as [T]-[][T], where "[]" indicates the mean over the indicated time span.
Covariance between specific humidity and vertical components of the wind. Defined as [q]-[][q], where "[]" indicates the mean over the indicated time span.
Covariance between surface pressure and surface pressure. Defined as [Psfc]-[Psfc][Psfc], where "[]" indicates the mean over the indicated time span.
Covariance between specific humidity and specific humidy. Defined as [qq]-[q][q], where "[]" indicates the mean over the indicated time span.
Covariance between vertical and vertical components of the wind. Defined as []-[][], where "[]" indicates the mean over the indicated time span.
Covariance between temperature and temperature. Defined as [TT]-[T][T], where "[]" indicates the mean over the indicated time span.
